title.rendered: Netherlands Economic Consultation on Trade, Investment, Agriculture, and Renewable Energy

content.rendered:
Today, 6th June, 2023 the Nigeria – Netherlands Economic Consultation on Trade, Investment, Agriculture, and Renewable Energy held in the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Abuja. The Permanent Secretary of MFA, Amb. Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa was represented by Amb. Akinremi Bolaji, Director (ETID), MFA.
The Bilateral Consultation was co-Chaired by Amb. Akinremi Bolaji on the Nigerian side and the Vice Minister for Foreign Trade, H.E. Hanneke Schuiling on the Dutch side.
Discussions also centred on Visa related matters, Technical Assistance, and Avoidance of Double Taxation, among others.
